TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MessageBox extends System.Object

summary.span: 显示消息窗口（也称为对话框）向用户展示消息。

span.span: Displays a message window, also known as a dialog box, which presents a message to the user.

summary.span: 这是一个模式窗口，可阻止应用程序中的其他操作，直到用户将其关闭。

span.span: It is a modal window, blocking other actions in the application until the user closes it.

summary.span: 可包含通知并指示用户的文本、按钮和符号。

span.span: A can contain text, buttons, and symbols that inform and instruct the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法创建的新实例类。You cannot create a new instance of the class. 若要显示一个消息框，请调用`static`方法。To display a message box, call the `static` method . 由传递给此方法的参数确定标题、 消息、 按钮和消息框中显示的图标。The title, message, buttons, and icons displayed in the message box are determined by parameters that you pass to this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用通知用户中的缺少项。The following code example shows how to use a to inform the user of a missing entry in a . 此示例需要从现有窗体与调用该方法名为**ServerName**在其上。This example requires that the method is called from an existing form with a named **ServerName** on it. [!code-cpp[MessageBox.Show Variations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MessageBox.Show Variations/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageBox.Show Variations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MessageBox.Show Variations/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageBox.Show Variations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MessageBox.Show Variations/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何询问 yes 或 no 问题的用户，并做出决策基于响应。The following code example shows how to ask the user a yes or no question and make a decision based on the response. [!code-cpp[Classic MessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MessageBox Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MessageBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MessageBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic MessageBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用`owner`参数来指定特定对象，该实现对象接口，将充当对话框的顶级窗口和所有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 一个消息框是模式对话框，这意味着没有输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 模式的窗体上的对象不能进行除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭模式中的窗体 （通常对某些用户执行任何操作的响应） 到另一种形式的输入之前进行。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 默认情况下，消息框显示**确定**按钮。By default, the message box displays an **OK** button. 消息框不包含标题中的标题。The message box does not contain a caption in the title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用`owner`参数来指定特定对象，该实现对象接口，将充当对话框的顶级窗口和所有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 一个消息框是模式对话框，这意味着没有输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 模式的窗体上的对象不能进行除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭模式中的窗体 （通常对某些用户执行任何操作的响应） 到另一种形式的输入之前进行。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 你最多可以有三个按钮的消息框上。You can have a maximum of three buttons on the message box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示的此重载支持的选项与。The following code example demonstrates how to display a with the options supported by this overload of . 后验证字符串变量， `ServerName`，是空的该示例显示，为用户提供选项来取消该操作。After verifying that a string variable, `ServerName`, is empty, the example displays a , offering the user the option to cancel the operation. 如果方法的返回值的计算结果为，显示窗体已关闭。If the method's return value evaluates to , the form that displayed the is closed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个消息框是模式对话框，这意味着没有输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 模式的窗体上的对象不能进行除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭模式中的窗体 （通常对某些用户执行任何操作的响应） 到另一种形式的输入之前进行。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 当用户单击帮助按钮时，帮助文件中指定`helpFilePath`打开参数和帮助关键字主题由`keyword`参数显示。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help keyword topic identified by the `keyword` parameter is displayed. 拥有消息框 （或活动窗体） 的窗体还会收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示具有帮助按钮的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box with a Help button. 当用户单击帮助按钮，`Mspaint.chm`打开帮助文件，通过标识主题`mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm`显示关键字。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the topic identified by the `mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm` keyword is displayed. 该示例需要`Mspaint.chm`安装帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个消息框是模式对话框，这意味着没有输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 模式的窗体上的对象不能进行除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭模式中的窗体 （通常对某些用户执行任何操作的响应） 到另一种形式的输入之前进行。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 当用户单击帮助按钮时，帮助文件中指定`helpFilePath`参数将打开，并且帮助内容由`navigator`参数显示。When the user clicks the Help button, the help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help content identified by the `navigator` parameter is displayed. 拥有消息框 （或活动窗体） 的窗体还会收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. 已编译的帮助文件提供的内容、 索引、 搜索和页中的关键字链接表。Compiled Help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 你可以使用以下值`navigator`: ， ， ，或。You can use the following values for `navigator`: , , , or . `helpFilePath`参数可以为窗体 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示具有帮助按钮的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box with a Help button. 当用户单击帮助按钮，`Mspaint.chm`打开帮助文件并且帮助索引选项卡将显示。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the Help index tab is displayed. 该示例需要`Mspaint.chm`安装帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个消息框是模式对话框，这意味着没有输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 模式的窗体上的对象不能进行除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭模式中的窗体 （通常对某些用户执行任何操作的响应） 到另一种形式的输入之前进行。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 当用户单击帮助按钮时，帮助文件中指定`helpFilePath`参数将打开，并且帮助内容由`navigator`参数显示。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help content identified by the `navigator` parameter is displayed. 拥有消息框 （或活动窗体） 的窗体还会收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. 已编译的帮助文件提供的内容、 索引、 搜索和页中的关键字链接表。Compiled help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 你可以使用以下值`navigator`: ， ， ，或。You can use the following values for `navigator`: , , , or . 你可以使用`param`以提供进一步优化命令。You can use `param` to provide further refinement of the command. 如果在指定的值`navigator`参数是， ，或，此值应为`null`。If the value specified in the `navigator` parameter is , , or , this value should be `null`. 如果`navigator`参数引用，此值应引用包含要显示的主题的数字值的对象。If the `navigator` parameter references , this value should reference an object that contains the numeric value of the topic to display. `helpFilePath`参数可以为窗体 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示具有帮助按钮的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box with a Help button. 当用户单击帮助按钮，`Mspaint.chm`打开文件的帮助和帮助索引选项卡和由标识主题`ovals`显示关键字。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the Help index tab and the topic identified by the `ovals` keyword are displayed. 该示例需要`Mspaint.chm`安装帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个消息框是模式对话框，这意味着没有输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 模式的窗体上的对象不能进行除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭模式中的窗体 （通常对某些用户执行任何操作的响应） 到另一种形式的输入之前进行。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 你可以使用`owner`参数来指定特定对象，该实现对象接口，将充当对话框的顶级窗口。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level owner. 当用户单击帮助按钮时，帮助文件中指定`helpFilePath`打开参数和帮助关键字主题由`keyword`参数显示。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help keyword topic identified by the `keyword` parameter is displayed. 拥有消息框 （或活动窗体） 的窗体还会收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示作为父级的主窗口的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box parented to the main window. 消息框会显示帮助按钮。The message box displays a Help button. 当用户单击帮助按钮，`Mspaint.chm`打开帮助文件，通过标识主题`mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm`显示关键字。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the topic identified by the `mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm` keyword is displayed. 该示例需要`Mspaint.chm`安装帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个消息框是模式对话框，这意味着没有输入 （键盘或鼠标单击） 模式的窗体上的对象不能进行除外。A message box is a modal dialog box, which means no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 该程序必须隐藏或关闭模式中的窗体 （通常对某些用户执行任何操作的响应） 到另一种形式的输入之前进行。The program must hide or close a modal form (typically in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 你可以使用`owner`参数来指定特定对象，该实现对象接口，将充当对话框的顶级窗口和所有者。You can use the `owner` parameter to specify a particular object, which implements the interface, that will serve as the dialog box's top-level window and owner. 当用户单击帮助按钮时，帮助文件中指定`helpFilePath`参数将打开，并且帮助内容由`navigator`参数显示。When the user clicks the Help button, the Help file specified in the `helpFilePath` parameter is opened and the Help content identified by the `navigator` parameter is displayed. 拥有消息框 （或活动窗体） 的窗体还会收到事件。The form that owns the message box (or the active form) also receives the event. 已编译的帮助文件提供的内容、 索引、 搜索和页中的关键字链接表。Compiled help files provide table of contents, index, search, and keyword links in pages. 你可以使用以下值`navigator`: ， ， ，或。You can use the following values for `navigator`: , , , or . 你可以使用`param`以提供进一步优化命令。You can use `param` to provide further refinement of the command. 如果在指定的值`navigator`参数是， ，或，此值应为`null`。If the value specified in the `navigator` parameter is , , or , this value should be `null`. 如果`navigator`参数引用，此值应引用包含要显示的主题的数字值的对象。If the `navigator` parameter references , this value should reference an object that contains the numeric value of the topic to display. `helpFilePath`参数可以为窗体 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm。The `helpFilePath` parameter can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示作为父级的主窗口的消息框。The following code example demonstrates how to show a message box parented to the main window. 消息框会显示帮助按钮。The message box displays a Help button. 当用户单击帮助按钮，`Mspaint.chm`打开文件的帮助和帮助索引选项卡和由标识主题`ovals`显示关键字。When the user clicks the Help button, the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is opened and the Help index tab and the topic identified by the `ovals` keyword are displayed. 该示例需要`Mspaint.chm`安装帮助文件。The example requires that the `Mspaint.chm` Help file is installed.
